summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5871 for the improvement of 35th Avenue Northwest, from West 60th Street to the alley north thereof; and a certain alley; by paving the same; under Ordinance No. 77330, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
